title: DRDO Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for 08 Internship Posts
description: Defence Research and Development Organisation (DRDO) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 08 B.E/ B.Tech in Mechanical Engineering, M.Sc. candidates can grab this chance and apply for the DRDO Recruitment 2025 . Here we include the age limit, selection process, salarystructure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can apply on or before the last date of application. If you are looking ...
